tool_description: AI analyzes an individual's unique personality traits and crafts a persuasive message that is guaranteed to convert the recipient into a customer.

api_list.name: create_ proposal_personal
api_list.description: Create effective proposals that drives results and saves you time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://personalized-proposals-ai-rewriting-tool.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "personalized-proposals-ai-rewriting-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
